# Web (Ninja Trick)
## Overview
*Web (Su):***** The ninja can cast *[[Web (Spell)|web]]* as if she was a sorcerer of the same level. A ninja must have the *[[Spider Climb (Ninja Trick)|spider climb]]* trick before she can take this rick. Each use of this ability uses up 1 ki point.

**Source:** Ultimate Options Power of the Ninja (Super Genius Games), pg. 19
